channel.title: ZineQuest Kickstarter—Back Again from the Broken Land
channel.description:
The pre-launch page is live for the Back Again from the Broken Land Kickstarter!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/clovenpinegames/back-again-from-the-broken-landzinequest
Back Again from the Broken Land is a fantasy PbtA game about small adventurers sharing stories during the long journey home after a calamitous against the evil Doomslord. It is inspired by the more contemplative stretches of Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings. The game was originally published in Codex: Home and playtested on The Gauntlet. We will be revisinng and expanding the game text into a full zine version for ZineQuest, with a Kickstarter running for the first two weeks of February. Sign up at the pre-launch page to know exactly when the Kickstarter begins!

item.title: ZineQuest Kickstarter—Back Again from the Broken Land
item.dc:creator: @Pinto
item.description:
@Pinto wrote:

Very interesting take on an often overlooked or hand waved aspect of campaigns.

item.title: ZineQuest Kickstarter—Back Again from the Broken Land
item.dc:creator: @Alexi_Sarge
item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

And we are live, funded, and hitting awesome stretch goals! I’m so excited that the next stretch goal unlocks a hand-drawn fantasy map that we’ll print as the endpapers of the zine. Check it all out here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/clovenpinegames/back-again-from-the-broken-landzinequest

Read full topic

item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

The pre-launch page is live for the Back Again from the Broken Land Kickstarter!

Kickstarter

Coming soon: Back Again from the Broken Land—ZineQuest

A fantasy RPG about small adventurers sharing stories on the long walk home. Inspired by Tolkien, Powered by the Apocalypse. Zine Quest

Back Again from the Broken Land is a fantasy PbtA game about small adventurers sharing stories during the long journey home after a calamitous against the evil Doomslord. It is inspired by the more contemplative stretches of Tolkien’s The Lord of the Rings. The game was originally published in Codex: Home and playtested on The Gauntlet. We will be revisinng and expanding the game text into a full zine version for ZineQuest, with a Kickstarter running for the first two weeks of February. Sign up at the pre-launch page to know exactly when the Kickstarter begins!
